meanings.definition: A small, two-wheeled cart pulled by a person.
meanings.sent1: The jinrikisha rattled along the cobblestone road.
meanings.sent2: We hired a jinrikisha to take us around the city.
meanings.sent3: The jinrikisha driver had a big smile as he pedaled us around.
meanings.sent4: The jinrikisha became a symbol of traditional transportation in Japan.
meanings.sent5: The bright red jinrikisha stood out among the modern cars.
